tweets.text: Help us before something unrecoverable happens we‚Äôre not asking for much just the basic human right of fresh air @MattHancock @PHE_uk @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @BorisJohnson @StinkStopthe @DefraGovUK @Cap_it_off https://t.co/djtWnijAE0

Vickersway Park Kiosk is a 3rd location #Northwich where @GroundworkCLM are working with local volunteers to design & build drainage solutions that provide a  direct channelling of surface water from rainfall into #SuDS Thankyou @EnvAgencyNW for your support & investment ‚òîÔ∏èüí™üåßüå± https://t.co/gNNFCsw51x
And the @EnvAgency does what exactly? https://t.co/hW4PBXXY0Y

Environment Agency officers were out in #Bexley last week on a road stop with @MPSBexley. 40 vehicles were stopped, inc 12 vehicles carrying waste. One carrier was fined, while others were given advice or warnings. Make sure your waste carrier is licensed https://t.co/cFscOv0i4d https://t.co/29dS93PVbq

On of our Catchment Partnerships key @EnvAgencyNW invested @GroundworkCLM led programmes. Empowering local folk in Northwich to adapt community sites as climate changes. This time green urban drainage systems which will soak up rain and feed plants üå± to prevent local flooding https://t.co/KBqBg99R2w

Appalling destruction & still signs of silt in the river‚òπÔ∏èZero plant growthü§¨What is the situation with possible prosecution of the landowner ? @EnvAgency @theriverstrust @DefraWater https://t.co/NVkLDC7oK8

tweets.text: The @EnvAgency should have listened to the public instead of trying to sweep toxic fumes under the carpet badging them as ‚Äòodour complaints.‚Äô It‚Äôs not odour complaints - you‚Äôre letting them cause HARM to our physical & mental health @MattHancock @AaronBell4NUL #stopthestink https://t.co/EDiIdIpAff

Superb team effort and work complete on @MyNorthwich @GroundworkCLM @WGowyRivers & @EnvAgencyNW supported Rainzone programme. Smart green water capture #SuDs at The Old School House Lostock #Northwich Congratulations to all involved! Addressing water capture when the rain falls https://t.co/wWhyOyJG1I
@Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency Remind me again we are in 2021.

tweets.text: And on its jolly jaunt today, the STENCH from #Walleysquarrey has made it to Weston Crewe so far. That is how Far the "some odour expected" has spread its toxic filth @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids @MattHancock https://t.co/XNGtQ585y0

@GrahamFAppleton @Feargal_Sharkey @BuryLung @AquiferChalk @N_Rivers_Trust @theriverstrust @PondRiverStream @EnvAgencyAnglia @OuseEcologyEA @FascinatingFens @TheBrecksLP Probably but I just had to figure out what was causing the devastation to one of our internationally important #chalkstreams - UK holds 85% of world total of this precious habitat, to find out at which point up Lee Brook the problem was being caused, and to document what I saw...

People of Newcastle and Stoke, we should be worried. The 202 parts per cubic meter figure put out by @PHE_uk dwarfs these numbers from another landfill, but look at these peaks! @EnvAgency we need the data from the monitoring stations @ClareDinnisEA When do you call it dangerous? https://t.co/OAXO1TT6oF

tweets.text:
1 week to go until the @ICE_NE 30th Robert Stephenson Awards! Two projects delivered by Esh Construction's civil engineering division are shortlisted. Good luck to all involved! 

@DurhamCouncil @Pell_Frischmann @EnvAgency @STyne_Council & Southern Green Ltd https://t.co/q0vjNsYVhL

So much for today's Riverfly sampling session on the River Red. This is the plight of our #chalkstreams in 2021; another incident chipping away at the river's health. The insects at the bottom of the food chain need clean water all year, not just gaps between pollution events. https://t.co/pagGdjhXlz

Great team effort by Coventry Park Rangers, Keep Britain Tidy, WatersideCare and Friends of Sowe Valley to create a new wildflower meadow at Cemblet Woods @covparkranger @KeepBritainTidy @stwater @EnvAgencyMids @CRTWestMidlands https://t.co/TUMm73WsUb

tweets.text: @GlendajSharsted @MPGeorgeEustice @DefraFAS @SoilAssociation Not organic food waste, sewage sludge. According to @EnvAgency rules for applications out of date.

Just when you think the @EnvAgency are starting to listen there is yet more evidence of lip service @ClareDinnisEA . At this rate we will have to come to the Bristol Head Offices to see you - how else will stop you from taking the mickey out of us?! #stopthestink @StinkStopthe https://t.co/BQRJrvYO8H

After walking from #Freckenham down gorgeous Kennett-Lee Brook, a perfect-looking #chalkstream, as I slipped into #RiverLark at West Row on a perfect Saturday a.m., was buzzing with anticipation for a swim up Lee Brook. But, horrors! For almost a mile a DEAD ZONE! 
#MySwim 
1/7 https://t.co/R6psn3QXA6

tweets.text: @DHSCgovuk @DHSCgovuk @EnvAgency @MattHancock @PHE_uk Newcastle under Lyme is being poisoned by H2S and other toxic gases from landfill on a daily basis. Physical and mental health is being destroyed and suicide attempts made. This is a national crisis of epic proportions. @StinkStopthe https://t.co/ps8xtCQtj7

Our pension fund is committing to reach net zero by 2045 and halve emissions by 2030 through the companies it invests in.

Read more on our blog: https://t.co/nLL7Tfvl5i #NetZero https://t.co/2GnsacICLx

In Didsbury today I saw the brilliant work the @EnvAgency and emergency services are doing to defend the area from flooding.

If you think your home may be at risk of flooding, please follow the advice and be prepared: https://t.co/HnN45WjPXD https://t.co/7ltbpezYL8

tweets.text:
@HMUG_Hackney @Hillfortian @PymmesBrookERS @StonebridgeLock @RiverChess @Feargal_Sharkey @mayorofhackney @deedeelea @AquiferChalk @RiverActionUK @AnglingTrust @WildTroutTrust @WindrushWasp @ChilternSociety @Chilternstreams @CleanIlkley @RiverBeane @BuryLung @FriendsRib @ReviveTheWye @RachSalv @UnderwaterMedia @suesustainable @DougskiK @KarenShackleto5 @stormwater_jo @RussellB1ggs @PJennings88 @EnvAgency @Ofwat @riverstrust @Thames21 @theriverstrust We've set up a bathing water knowledge hub on slack to share experience between groups looking to apply for Bw designation or monitor water quality: https://t.co/p4C4cQHSHt 
Also there is the #endsewagepollution coalition chaired by @amyslack84

@gis_michelle @Hillfortian @PymmesBrookERS @StonebridgeLock @RiverChess @Feargal_Sharkey @mayorofhackney @deedeelea @AquiferChalk @RiverActionUK @AnglingTrust @WildTroutTrust @WindrushWasp @ChilternSociety @Chilternstreams @CleanIlkley @RiverBeane @BuryLung @FriendsRib @ReviveTheWye @RachSalv @UnderwaterMedia @suesustainable @DougskiK @KarenShackleto5 @stormwater_jo @RussellB1ggs @PJennings88 @EnvAgency @Ofwat @riverstrust @Thames21 We haven't seen the ripping yet - but have been around campaigning long enough to know every network has politics. Is there an online forum? Haven't found it so far. If not, could, say, @theriverstrust or @AquiferChalk host one? Am I being naive? Sorry if putting foot in it.
